_comment: Example of the agents section when fully populated. Copy the 'agents' key into your .planning/config.json.
_comment_execution: Array of agent names for plan execution. If one agent, used for all plans. If multiple, orchestrator picks the best match based on task content and agent descriptions.
_comment_verification: Single agent name for post-wave verification. Optional. When omitted, no verification wave is spawned.
_comment_defaults: When the agents key is empty ({}) or missing entirely, all routing falls back to default agent types (general-purpose).
